definition: variant of 煙蒂|烟蒂[yan1 di4]/cigarette butt

sentences.english: He was told that a council officer had reason to believe he was "dripping his cigarette" while driving his car.
sentences.chinese: 他被告知政府有理由相信他在開車期間“亂彈菸蒂”。

sentences.english: Small stubs do great harm to the woods.
sentences.chinese: 小小菸蒂危害大，樹木見了都害怕。

sentences.english: Xie be free demolition of the chassis, and facilitate the removal intraday cigarette butts .
sentences.chinese: 可自由拆缷的底盤，方便清理盤中的菸蒂。

sentences.english: Please put your cigarette ends into the receptacle provided.
sentences.chinese: 請將菸蒂放入提供旳盛器裏。

sentences.english: She put him out like the burnin end of a midnight cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 她撲滅他的愛，像熄滅午夜盡頭燃燒的菸蒂。

sentences.english: The man with the flat face and the broken nose crushed the end of the cigarette on the table.
sentences.chinese: 長着扁臉和斷鼻樑的人在桌上撳滅了菸蒂。

sentences.english: The floor under them was black with grease and cigarette ends.
sentences.chinese: 腳下的地板烏光光的油膩滑溜，菸蒂滿地。

sentences.english: I just saw you throw a cigarette butt and step on it.
sentences.chinese: 剛纔看見你丟掉菸蒂，然後用腳踩熄。

sentences.english: The room is dense with papers, andcoffee cups and cigarettes overflow from ashtrays; there’s a partiallyarticulated snake skeleton on his desk.
sentences.chinese: 房間裏堆滿了紙和咖啡杯，菸蒂從菸灰缸裏滿了出來。

sentences.english: He stamped his butt on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他在地板上踩滅了他的菸蒂。

sentences.english: It is a cigarette-end from it gently rises a thread of smoke.
sentences.chinese: 那是一個菸蒂，一縷煙還在冉冉上升。

sentences.english: The room is dense with papers, andcoffee cups and cigarettes overflow from ashtrays;
sentences.chinese: 房間裏堆滿了紙和咖啡杯，菸蒂從菸灰缸裏滿了出來。

sentences.english: I dinched the cigarette carefully, put the stub into the cigarette case.
sentences.chinese: 我小心地掐滅香菸，把菸蒂仍裝進煙盒裏。

definition: water spot/water stain/wet spot/damp patch/water damage
head of a flight of stairs
see 打火機|打火机[da3 huo3 ji1]
variant of 門閂|门闩[men2 shuan1]
see 驚慌失措|惊慌失措[jing1 huang1 shi1 cuo4]
to break the door down and enter (idiom)
